name: A Tea Time Travesty
description:
A travesty brews as tea is about to be spilled...

This game was made for the Trijam 3 hour game jam.

It was made with some aid of my girlfriend (we share this page). We originally set out to make an entirely different game but realized there wasn't enough time to make it. So half the time gone we started over and made this. It was a stressful adventure but fun. I'm very happy with the art style in particular. 

We thank those who play it and we hope you enjoy it!

Controls: 

Left and Right or W and D to move left and right

Made using the Godot Engine in 2 hours and 36 minutes
